//http://www.codechef.com/problems/DS08
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	char str[10000],ch; int i,t;
	while(scanf("%s",str)!=EOF)
	{
		for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
		{   if(str[i]=='X') printf("A");
		      else if (str[i]=='Y') printf("B");
		      else if (str[i]=='Z') printf("C");
		      else{
			t=3;
			while(t--) str[i]++;
			printf("%c",str[i]); }
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
